Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 15th sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.This poster has possibly been cropped. The photographs show reconstruction work, as well as militia training.
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
